title: Bacon, mushroom and sweetcorn quiche
ingredients: ['170g (6oz) shortcrust pastry', '4 to 5 medium eggs', '6 rashers smoked streaky bacon, cooked', '6 to 8 large closed cap mushrooms, chopped and saut√©ed', '1 small tin sweetcorn', '1 handful grated Cheddar cheese', '100ml milk', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'tomato, sliced (optional)']
